data.eml:eml: A revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Rhyacopsyche, with the description of 13 new species (Trichoptera: Hydroptilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wasmund, Anne M., Holzenthal, Ralph W. (2007): A revision of the Neotropical caddisfly genus Rhyacopsyche, with the description of 13 new species (Trichoptera: Hydroptilidae). Zootaxa 1634: 1-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179477
